ADVANCED CERTIFICATE COURSE
The Advanced Certificate Course (ACC) Is For Those Who Have Successfully Gone Through The Basic Certificate Course.
This Programme Will Give You A Deeper Level Of Insight To Become A Giant In Your Field.

COURSES OFFERED INCLUDE

SUPERNATURAL WISDOM
This Course Exposes The Student To Understand That The Foundation For Wisdom Is Knowledge And Every Believer Needs Wisdom To Excel In Life. Wisdom Is Not Genetic, It Is Not Inborn. It Is A Choice And A Necessity In Life.

SUPERNATURAL SUPPLIES
To Help The Student Understand The Sufficiency Of God And Recognize The Willingness Of God To Supply All Needs. God Does Not Need Permission From The Devil To Bless.

DETERMINING DIVINE DIRECTION
To Understand The Working Knowledge Of Divine Direction Thereby Compelling Action. Appreciating The Need To Live A Life Continually Obedient To The Leading And Prompting Of The Holy Spirit.

DEVELOPING CHRISTIAN CHARACTER
To Reveal The Indispensable Role Of Character For Success In Life, Equipping The Students On How To Build A Solid Christian Character For Eternal Benefits And To Reveal The Negative Effects Of Comprise And How It Hampers Destiny.

HEALING THE SICK
To Learn How You Can Receive Your Healing, Knowing The Different Ways The Believer Can Administer Healing. To Know That Healing Is A Universal Privilege As Salvation Is. It Is For Whosoever Will.

HOW FAITH WORKS (2)
It Enables The Students Shift To Another Dimension Of Faith So As To Tackle Complex Challenges Of Life, And Achieve Better Results Or Obtain Greater Victory On Earth.

PRINCIPLES OF FINANCIAL EXCELLENCE
This Course Reveals The Kingdom-mindset Of Prosperity And Abundance And To Equip Them With Relevant Covenant Attitudes Or Principles That Guarantee Financial Excellence.

THE ANOINTING
To Enlighten The Students On The Importance Of Anointing In Our Christian Walk And How To Receive The Anointing And Keep Increasing In It.

SPIRITUAL WARFARE
To Enhance The Understanding Of Man’s Involvement In This World. To Clearly And Firmly Establish Our Authority Over The Forces Of Wickedness. It Also Educates On How To Be Free From All Oppressive Forces Of Hell.

DIVINE PROTECTION
Divine Protection Is An Eternal Provision For The Elect Of God. Knowledge Of Divine Protection Puts You Considerably Ahead Of Your Enemy. The Truth Which Is Made Available To You Will Definitely Set You Free From Every Attack.

SUCCESS IN FAMILY
To Accept Responsibility That Leads To Success In Marriage, Enable Reconciliation And Peaceful Coexistence And To Ensure Success In The Family Of Students.

PRINCIPLES OF MINISTRY
At The End Of This Course, Students Should Have Acquired The Details On How To Start/commence A Ministry, Run The Ministry, And Deal With Opposition In The Process Of Running The Ministry And The Adequate Steps To Take To Enjoy Growth In Ministry.

SPIRITUAL LEADERSHIP
To Know The Need Or Importance Of Spiritual Leadership In Any Field Of Endeavour, And Establish That There Is Leadership Potential Inside Everyone, Which Requires Certain Effort And Process To Harness.
